wikipedia_page.main: John Robert Edwards Sumner (14 November 1850 – 15 October 1933) was an amateur footballer who played for Oxford University in the 1873 FA Cup Final. He was later a rancher in the United States.

response: *John Robert Sumner (1850–1933), footballer who played for Oxford University A.F.C. in the 1873 FA Cup Final and was later a rancher in Yampa, ColoradoHarrow, 1800–1911, p. 380
* John Robert Sumner (1850–1933), amateur footballer and 1873 FA Cup finalist
* John Robert Sumner (1850–1933), English amateur footballer, played in 1873 FA Cup Final (grandson of John Bird Sumner)
